videos.title: Muck n' Mac Fest 2022
videos.description:
Feast your eyes upon the Muck n’ Mac Fest 2022 after movie, courtesy of @six4productions!

After a couple cancellations through Covid, it was an absolute pleasure to finally deliver the festival at Traquair House… Aaand what a setting it was! Thank-you so much for having us @traquair House!

Our thanks also goes out to Event Scotland, the support we’ve had on the National Events Programme has been invaluable and helped us deliver the exact vision we’ve had in mind over these past few years. 

Also, to our amazing event partners both local and further afield – your support has truly helped sculpt the event into a cracker, that’s hopefully here to stay for many years to come!

No event like this is possible without the help of an amazing team of volunteers, thank-you so much – it really means the world to a small company that’s on the way up!

Lastly, so thankful to all our attendees who joined us in 2022. We’re really grateful for all your constructive feedback in our post-event forms, we’ve read through comments meticulously and already have plans underway to go beyond your expectations for the second edition. 

See you in 2023?

videos.title: Muck n' Mac Fest Teaser
videos.description:
Muck n' Mac Fest 29th April - 1st May 2022. 

Staged in the grounds of Scotland's oldest inhabited Home, Traquair House will host the inaugural festival in 2022.

Nestled in the heart of the Tweed Valley, Traquair just so happens to be the gateway to some of the finest gravel riding the country has to offer! 

Over the course of the weekend, riders will take on 6 timed stages, which are accumulated in a GC format for the overall. In between, the clock stops running, giving riders the opportunity to kick back, have a blether and take in the rolling hills of the Borders that surround. 

The weekend is as much about riding as the time off the bike. Our festival village has an amazing mix of activities on offer. Expect to see; live music, film, event partner expo, camping, yoga, bar areas, mixed catering experiences and various family friendly activities around the grounds of the house.

videos.title: Behind the scenes in the bike industry at Muck n Mac gravel cycling event and race
videos.description:
Ever wondered what us industry bods do whilst you're out racing at events? May 2025 saw Muck n Mac kick off the GrAlba Series of gravel cycling races and Grinduro Scotland. I went along to represent Bridgedale - one of my bike industry clients - and speak to riders and event organisers as well as network with some bike industry friends.

Much more to come to the channel from more behind the scenes videos to race videos, Hyrox, The Gralloch, Sarn Helen challenge, Grinduro, Gritfest and much more as well as more about living life without limits and life without number as we aim for World Champs qualifying in UCI gravel and Hyrox fitness racing.

This channel is dedicated to all those people 45+ (or approaching the age milestone) who think their best fitness years are behind them. Join me and together we will prove that wrong! Life is for adventure and to move. Experience it all, age is just a number. Live #lifewithoutnumber Life starts here!

Thanks for watching folks! 

I am a bike industry professional of many years but al products here are bought by me and are not clients. I will always say when a product featured is a client of mine. No BS. It's the way I live and honesty is the very least anyone deserves in life.
